  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SubstitutionUtilities.SubstitutionException
    Exception occurring when computing a substitution.
    SubstitutionUtilities.SubstitutionUnionException
    Happens when union of two substitution functions is inconsistent (it does not produce a new substitution function).
